Larahawk

Simple and powerful log monitoring for Laravel applications

Let's Get Started →

Painless

Get installed and set up in under 5 minutes with Composer and Artisan.

Simple

Watches your application for errors and log changes, alerting you immediately.

Compatible

Currently works with Laravel 5.5+, with a goal in mind of 5.0+.
